metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49464 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: libheif v1.17.5 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via thefunctionUncompressedImageCodec::get_luma_bits_per_pixel_from_configuration_unci.

criterions.comment: libheif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
